text: Dale Ham is a pioneering American gasser drag racer.Davis, Larry. Gasser Wars (Cartech, 2003), p.180. Driving a Dodge-powered 1929 Ford, he won NHRA's first-ever C/SR (C Street) championship, at Great Bend, Kansas, in 1955.Davis, p.180. His winning speed was .Davis, p.180. (His elapsed time was not recorded or has not been preserved.) He won no other NHRA national gasser championships.Davis, p.180-6. ==Notes== ==Sources== *Davis, Larry. Gasser Wars, North Branch, MN: Cartech, 2003, p.180. Category:Dragster drivers
title: Dale Ham
